title: 1.15检测玩家移动
author: qw986354084
txt_content: 请问大佬如何检测玩家移动（1.15）

replies.author: 晴路卡
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 晴路卡 于 2020-5-4 22:47 编辑 

玩家移动的方式有多种（走 跑 蹲走 游泳）
与其用记分板判据不如之间检测前后游戏刻坐标的变化
创建几个记分板：
scoreboard objectives add PosX_l dummy
scoreboard objectives add PosY_l dummy
scoreboard objectives add PosZ_l dummy
scoreboard objectives add PosX dummy
scoreboard objectives add PosY dummy
scoreboard objectives add PosZ dummy复制代码
高频执行以下命令：
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s PosX_l = @s PosX
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s PosY_l = @s PosY
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s PosZ_l = @s PosZ
execute as @a store result score @s PosX run data get entity @s Pos[0] 10
execute as @a store result score @s PosY run data get entity @s Pos[1] 10
execute as @a store result score @s PosZ run data get entity @s Pos[2] 10
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s PosX_l -= @s PosX
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s PosY_l -= @s PosY
execute as @a run scoreboard players operation @s PosZ_l -= @s PosZ
tag @a add move
tag @a[scores={PosX_l=0,PosY_l=0,PosZ_l=0}] remove move
execute as @e[tag=move] run say move复制代码
玩家一旦移动就会输出“move”.

replies.author: もぺもぺ

qw986354084 发表于 2020-5-4 20:37
就是检测到玩家移动后执行指令
/scoreboard objectives add walk minecraft.custom:minecraft.walk_one_cm 

高频
/execute as @a if score @s walk matches 1.. run say 动了
/execute as @a if score @s walk matches 1.. run scoreboard players remove @s  walk
